title: Person of Interest 2x16 even you can't run forever
author: George Finch
comment: "Set out to correct the world's wrongs and you'll almost certainly wind up adding to them." That is SUCH A GOOD QUOTE. WOW The writing of this show is honestly so f**king good.
I love how he says you can call me Harold instead of my name is Harold. He's actually not lying. He's just saying you can call me that but not that it's his real name.

Who is here in 2021 and thinking this Series needed a reboot??
Have been a fan all along.  It's an unhealthy number I've watched the episodes for.
This show was so intense loved every minute of it RIP John
"The world looks like it did 10 years ago. But underneath its become very strange indeed."
description: Person of Interest 2x16 Relevance conversation between Finch and Shaw
